item.title: How many HTTP 404 errors are in the RStudio Blog?
item.description: Recently I was reading a post from 2020 on the RStudio Blog, when I followed a link in the post only to findâ€¦ Of course, it was easy to find the intended page with Google, but it made me curious: How many HTTP 404 (Page Not Found) errors like this exist in the RStudio Blog? Which links are broken? Could these broken links be easily fixed?
